nodes.text: Bareesh Fenn'ak Torill, also known as Bareesh the Hutt or simply Bareesh, was a Hutt crime lord on Nar Shaddaa of the Bareesh Clan which was a part of the Hutt Cartel. He was also the leader of the Kintan Kings before being overthrown by five brothers known as The Mountain. Afterwards, he assisted the Galactic Republic with its operations on Nar Shaddaa.
